articles.description: Plug Power's (PLUG) Q4 earnings are likely to have gained from the growing popularity of fuel-cell solutions. High costs and operating expenses, supply-chain...
articles.content:
Plug Power Inc. PLUG is expected to release fourth-quarter 2021 results later this week.
The company delivered better-than-expected results once in the trailing four quarters and missed estimates th… [+5410 chars]
